text: 2012年6月2日 まんたんウェブ is a Japanese-American model オリコン芸能人事典，日本タレント名鑑 who is affiliated with Isle management. Hasegawa became a popular model when she was an exclusive model in the fashion magazine Vivi in 2005. Sports Nippon (June 30, 2011) She appeared in the magazine for eight years and appeared in the magazine, Glamorous, and has been active in the tarento industry. 2011年1月31日 モデルプレス ==Filmography== ===TV series=== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- bgcolor="#B0C4DE" align="center" !
